item.title: Retrieval recommender systems with TensorFlow
item.description: Introduction to recommender systems Some of the most exciting features that big companies like Amazon, Netflix, and Spotify offer rely on recommender systems. Much useful information can be collected whenever users navigate the Amazon website, listen to a playlist on Spotify, or scroll through the Netflix catalog. This data includes user behavior, item attributes, or interactions between users and is what machine learning recommender systems use to make personalized recommendations.

item.title: Thinking Negatively
item.description: Feeling ready to do something does not mean feeling certain that you’ll succeed, though of course that’s what you are hoping to do. Truly being ready means understanding what could go wrong – and having a plan to deal with it. Chris Hadfield, An Astronaut’s Guide to Life on Earth Eliud Kipchoge is considered the greatest marathon runner of all time. As with the most iconic athletes, the principles and values they embody are far more relevant than their achievements.
